description: Adaptive Layout definition for the Hidden component.

contains.description: The contained component that will be hidden.
contains.label: Contains

for.description: The breakpoint conditions for which the contained component will be hidden (xs, sm, md, lg, xl).
for.label: For

xsDown.description: This content will only be displayed on extra small displays.
xsDown.label: Extra Small

smDown.description: This content will only be displayed on small displays or smaller.
smDown.label: Small

mdDown.description: This content will only be displayed on medium displays or smaller.
mdDown.label: Medium

lgDown.description: This content will only be displayed on large displays or smaller.
lgDown.label: Large

xlDown.description: This content will only be displayed on extra large displays or smaller.
xlDown.label: Extra Large
